Something about web crawler

03 Sep 2017


This post shows details of the some web crawler. These methods are all what I used in some project. All of them are written with python. You can go to the specific website by link.

A easy crawler

  • Link: https://github.com/hjw99868/easy_spider
  • Tools & Language: Scrapy & python2

This is the first web crawler I have writen. It is very easy for someone who is familiar with web crawler. But it’s a good program for a new comer.

If you want to learn web crawler, I think scrapy is a very good thing to learn first. Scrapy is an open source and collaborative framework for extracting the data you need from websites ,fo course, in a fast, simple, yet extensible way. You only need to learn a little python before use scrapy. Here is a very good document of scrapy in Chinese or in English.
